skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice cricket
des:
Voice cricket game is similar to book cricket game but instead of book we are using alexa.Book Cricket is an indoor game. It is popular among students in schools. Kids play this at home when the weather is not conducive for outdoor games. The easiness to play this game makes it more popular among kids. In our skill we are playing between user and alexa,where alexa will bat first and user has to chase the score. The overall match is of 2 over’s that is 12 balls. If the user reached the target in 12 balls (2.0 over’s) than the user is the winner else alexa is the winner

How to Play book cricket:
1) Player has to randomly open the book and look for the page number
2) The player should always look for the side of book which has even numbers on it.
3) In the opened page, look for the even number and take note of the last unit in that number. For Example: If the opened page is 154, then the last unit is 4 so the score is 4. So the possible scores are 2, 4, 6, 8.
4)2, 4 and 6 score will be added to the batsman score as such and 8 will be counted as 3 runs, it is decided at the beginning of the game when the decide on the number of bats man.
5) Close the book and open it again.
6) Note the score for that again.
7) The innings will go on until 2.0 over’s is complete
8) At the end whoever has the bigger score is the Winner

But for the voice cricket we need not have a book or pen ,Just an alexa with voice cricket game enabled skill
How to Voice cricket:
1) Just enable skill and launch it
2) Once you have updated your name alexa will bat for 12 balls (2.0 over’s) and will give the target
3) You just have to hit the ball to score the runs ,rest alexa will take car.
4) You can bat for 2.0 over’s(12 balls) and chase the target

Alexa will suggest the required runs from balls remaining
